data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Fajfer, Monika (2019): Systematics of reptile-associated scale mites of the genus Pterygosoma (Acariformes: Pterygosomatidae) derived from external morphology. Zootaxa 4603 (3): 401-440, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4603.3.1
